short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converting Amazon list price from dollar to work hours

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension converts the list price on Amazon from dollar to the work hours based on the hourly income rate.
Default rate is $12.00/hr.

Rate can be modified by click extension icon.
